text.tspan: Configure how Firefox connects to the Internet
Always use the cursor keys to navigate within pages
Saerch for text when you are typing
Tools for editing and debugging HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
These settings are tailored to your computer's hardware and operating system.
Keep Firefox up to date for the best performance, stability, and security.
Check for updates but let you choose to install them
Choose how Firefox handles the files you download from the web or the applications you use while
Always ask you where to save files
Check your spelling as you type
Choose your preferred language for displaying pages
Ctrl+Tab cycles through tabs in recently used order
Open new windows in a new tab instead
When you open a link in a new tab, switch to it immediately
Always check if Firefox is your default browser
Firefox is not your default browser
